content: FIX BUG: Director routing logic missing analyst agent keywords - always routes scan tasks to coder instead of analyst
Add Director to AgentType enum for bidirectional communication
DEBUG: Find bottleneck in Director request processing - Ollama responds in 5.8s but Director endpoint takes 2+ minutes
OPTIMIZE: Director now uses phi4-mini with reduced prompt (7.5s vs 26s) - 3x speedup achieved
DEBUG: /request_agent endpoint still timing out - issue is NOT in Director but in routing layer
OPTIMIZE: Enhancement phases parallel execution + caching implemented - estimated 3-4x speedup (45s â†’ ~12s)
IMPLEMENT: Delta Memory System - add file system change detection without breaking existing memory
DESIGN: Memory Agent as Central Knowledge Hub - single source of truth for all agent knowledge
OPTIMIZE: Incremental file scanning - only analyze changed sections instead of full file re-reads
